nodes.bodyText:
Can you make this consistent to the version in other ...assessment.service.ts?
Also notice that we would like to avoid the use of null on the client side

we should add a TODO to make this consistent with the other ...assessment.service.ts files.
For now we could rename it and reorder the parameters
Does it really make sense to use Boolean(true).toString() ? Could we not just use 'true' ?
